Model Evaluation Metrics for regression problems - MAE, RMSE, MSE, and MAP

desc: K Means Algorithms - Partition based model for clustering

desc: Non-Parametric algorithms and Lazy learning ideology

AboutCourseHeading.heading: Why is Data Analytics training popular?
AboutCourseHeading.para: All industries use Data Analytics since it assists businesses in thoroughly understanding their clients and services. It also sufficiently provides data insights and is helpful in planning future outcomes with the analysis. Every business demand operational efficiency by improvising the technical ability, engaging users, and revenue generation. For the purpose of taking business decisions at their best, the need for Data Analyst professionals has come up. Start your career by enrolling in Data Analytics training that will help you attain success.

data.heading: How to choose best data analytics course online?
data.para: A data analytics course typically covers a wide range of topics related to the field of data analysis. Here are some key areas that are often included in such courses:

list.title: Introduction to Data Analytics:
list.desc: This module provides an overview of the field of data analytics, its applications, and the importance of data-driven decision-making.

list.title: Statistics and Probability:
list.desc: Understanding statistical concepts and probability theory is crucial for data analysis. This module covers topics such as descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, and probability distributions.

list.title: Data Wrangling and Data Preparation:
list.desc: This module focuses on techniques for data cleaning, data integration, data transformation, and dealing with missing or inconsistent data.

list.title: Big Data Analytics:
list.desc: With the growing availability of large and complex datasets, this module focuses on handling and analyzing big data. It covers topics such as distributed computing frameworks (e.g., Hadoop, Spark), parallel processing, and scalable data analysis techniques.

list.title: Tools and Programming Languages:
list.desc: Data analytics courses often include instruction on popular data analytics tools and programming languages, such as R or Python. Students learn how to use these tools to manipulate data, perform statistical analyses, and create visualizations.

list.title: Practical Projects and Case Studies:
list.desc: Many data analytics courses include hands-on projects and real-world case studies to provide practical experience. Students work on analyzing real datasets and applying the techniques learned throughout the course.

data.para1: It's important to note that the specific topics and depth of coverage can vary between different data analytics courses. Some courses may focus more on certain areas depending on the intended audience or the program's objectives. When choosing a data analytics course, it's advisable to review the curriculum and ensure that it aligns with your learning goals and career aspirations.

data.heading: What is data analytics course?
data.para: A data analytics course is a program of study that teaches students the skills and techniques needed to collect, analyze, and interpret data. Data analytics is a rapidly growing field, with a high demand for skilled professionals. A data analytics course can help you develop the skills you need to land a job in this exciting field. Data analytics courses typically cover a wide range of topics, including:

list.desc: Data collection and preparation
Data analysis techniques
Data visualization
Business analytics
Machine learning

data.para1: If you are interested in a career in data analytics, a data analytics course can be a great way to get started. There are many different courses available, both online and in person. Choose a course that is accredited and that meets your needs and goals.

data.heading: What is the benefits of taking data analytics certification courses?
data.para: Here are some of the benefits of taking a data analytics Certification course:

list.title: Gain relevant skills
list.desc: You can Develop the skills you need to land a job in a rapidly growing field. Our mentors will help you to prepare for an data analytics interview

list.title: Gain Realtime knowledge
list.desc: Gain the knowledge and experience you need to make data-driven decisions.

list.title: Data analytics projects:
list.desc: Help you to improve your problem-solving and analytical skills
Problem-solving skills: Data Analytics requires a combination of technical and analytical skills, making it an ideal field for those who enjoy solving complex problems.

list.title: Get Data analytics certification from Microsoft:
list.desc: After completing the course you will get a Microsoft Data analytics certification which will be help you in getting a job.

data.para1: Upon completing a data analytics course, individuals can pursue careers as data analysts, data scientists, business analysts, or data consultants in a wide range of industries, including finance, healthcare, marketing, e-commerce, and more. They are equipped with the skills to extract valuable insights from data, identify patterns, and make informed decisions based on data analysis.

data.heading: What is best data analytics course duration?
data.para: The duration of a data analytics course can vary depending on the depth of the curriculum, the level of the course (introductory, intermediate, advanced), and the learning format (full-time, part-time, online). Here are some common durations for data analytics courses:

list.title: Short-term Courses:
list.desc: These courses typically range from a few days to a few weeks. They provide a basic introduction to data analytics concepts and tools, focusing on specific topics or skills within the field.

list.title: Bootcamp-style Courses:
list.desc: These intensive programs often last around 8 to 12 weeks, with full-time, immersive learning experiences. They cover a comprehensive range of topics in data analytics, including data manipulation, statistical analysis, data visualization, and machine learning.

list.title: Online or Self-paced Courses:
list.desc: Online data analytics courses offer flexibility in terms of learning pace and duration. They can range from a few weeks to several months, Our Course covers total modules and learning path to make some one professional data analyst.

data.para1: The best duration for a data analytics course depends on your existing knowledge, learning goals, and the time you can dedicate to the course. Shorter courses can provide a basic understanding and introduction to data analytics, while longer programs offer more comprehensive knowledge and practical experience. Consider your availability, desired level of proficiency, and career aspirations when selecting the duration of a data analytics course.

data.heading: Why Choose Skillslash for data analytics course?
data.para: Skillslash offers more than just job placement assistance by educating students on improving their online profiles and resumes. In addition, students are required to engage in practice interviews for employment purposes. The recorded lectures will be available to you for three years, allowing you to access them anytime, anywhere, and for any duration you prefer. Taking courses from industry experts in your field is a beneficial step towards advancing your career. Apart from our Data analytics certification, our data analytics courses will equip you with the necessary training to excel in your job. Plus, enjoy the benefits of dual certification – Microsoft-certified and also real-work certification from top MNC/Startups.

list.desc: Interactive Learning: Instead of passive film-watching, we promote active engagement and lively discussions among students during our live sessions, encouraging their active participation in the learning process.
Video Resources: In addition to the scheduled live lectures, students now have access to over 350 hours of recorded lectures, providing them with a valuable video backup for their learning needs.

Employment Assurance: Job security is the assurance that your efforts, investments, and work will be rewarded with ongoing employment. Our 100% Job Guarantee program ensures that upon completing our program, you can have confidence in securing a fulfilling role.

Hands-on Experience: Through internships with reputable AI companies, students have the opportunity to apply their classroom knowledge to real-world scenarios, fostering the development of critical thinking and independent problem-solving skills.
Personalized Learning: The 'Build Your Own Course' (BYOC) approach allows students and counselors to collaborate in designing customized lesson plans tailored to individual needs and preferences.

data.heading: What is data analytics courses eligibility?
data.para: The eligibility requirements for data analytics courses can vary depending on the institution or organization offering the course and the level of the course (introductory, intermediate, advanced). Here are some general eligibility criteria for data analytics courses:

list.title: Educational Background:
list.desc: Most data analytics courses do not have strict prerequisites in terms of specific educational qualifications. However, courses at the intermediate or advanced level may require a basic understanding of mathematics, statistics, and programming concepts. Some courses may have recommended or required prerequisites in fields such as mathematics, computer Analytics, or statistics.

list.title: Professional Experience:
list.desc: Data analytics courses are open to both professionals and individuals with no prior work experience. Some advanced or specialized courses may target professionals who already have a background in data analysis, business analytics, or related fields.

list.title: Programming Skills:
list.desc: While not always a mandatory requirement, having basic programming skills can be beneficial for data analytics courses. Many data analytics courses use programming languages such as R or Python, so familiarity with programming concepts and the ability to write code is helpful.

list.title: Language Proficiency:
list.desc: Depending on the course delivery mode and language of instruction, applicants may need to meet certain language proficiency requirements. English is commonly used as the language of instruction for data analytics courses offered internationally.

data.para1: Skillslash also makes it easy and affordable for you to finance your education. We offer easy financing options including an EMI system, so you don't have to worry about the financial burden of the data analytics course. Finally, our team provides resume preparation training and mock interviews, and we also provide job referrals to help you get placed in a top company after completing the data analytics course. We offer a comprehensive, industry-relevant training program that will give you the skills and experience you need to excel in the field of data Analytics. With live interactive classes, industry expert mentors, real-world experience, easy financing options, and job placement assistance, Skillslash is an excellent choice for anyone looking to start a career in data Analytics.

data.heading: Why One Should Take The data analytics course? Is Data analytics certification being worth pursuing as a career?
data.para: Data Analytics is a highly valuable and in-demand field, and taking a data analytics course can help individuals gain the skills and knowledge needed to pursue a career in this field. The course would provide an introduction to the key concepts and tools used in data Analytics, such as programming languages, statistical analysis, and machine learning, as well as hands-on experience working with data. The course could also help individuals understand the business applications of data Analytics and how data can be used to inform decision making.
data.para1: Regarding Data analytics certification online training, it depends on the individual's career goals and the specific certification program. Generally, a Data analytics certification can demonstrate that an individual has a certain level of knowledge and skills in the field, which can be helpful for job applicants or those looking to advance their careers. However, it's important to note that a certification alone may not guarantee a job or a promotion, and employers will also look at an individual's experience and portfolio of work. Therefore, it's worth pursuing a Data analytics certification if it aligns with your career goals and you are willing to put in the time and effort to earn it.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Here’s a list of FAQs on Skillslash’s Data Analytics course that brings understanding to enrich an effective career ahead.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the duration of the Data Analytics Course and what modules are covered?
FaqDATA.ans: The duration of our Data Analytics Course lasts for five months. But the time you spend learning will vary according to your schedule (weekdays/weekends). You are allowed to choose your preference of modules through customization, for your reference you can check the syllabus part. In particular, the Data Analytics Course will be starting with programming principles like Python and cloud basics and work up to sophisticated Excel, DBMS like SQL and NoSQL, and data visualization with tools like Power BI and Tableau.

FaqDATA.ques: Is the Data Analytics Course only online?
FaqDATA.ans: We do provide hybrid learning approaches for both offline and online courses along with real work experience. Due to the pandemic outbreak, we can only provide Data Analytics Course online through interactive live lectures from top-tier working professionals to assist you with the industry metrics and demands.

FaqDATA.ques: How does the Data Analytics Course benefit me?
FaqDATA.ans: The Data Analytics Course has a compact class strength for concentrating on every individual learner thereby clearing doubts and providing clarifications on their weaknesses. Along with 250+ problematic assignments, you are made to tackle errors and come up with creative solutions. You can also have personalized 1:1 mentoring and doubt-solving sessions with mentors in our Data Analytics Course.

FaqDATA.ques: Is there any possibility to retake the Data Analytics Course classes if missed?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, you can always catch up on your missed lectures on the Data Analytics Course with the upcoming cohorts. Also, you will be provided with recorded sessions of the same classes through LMS. This supports you to refer to the previous sessions for any of the doubts that might come up.

FaqDATA.ques: Is an academic degree needed to signup for the Data Analytics Course?
FaqDATA.ans: No, you need not have any academic degree particularly. Anybody who is keen on building their career in their preferred field can enroll in Data Analytics Course. If you already have an academic degree that might be an advantage to skill up your knowledge level with respect to the course you studied. Getting a professional certificate is highly recommended, particularly in terms of career transition.

FaqDATA.ques: Does Skillslash’s Data Analytics Course have EMI and refund policies?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash has both EMI and refund policies as per the terms and conditions applied. Concerning EMI, we do provide learner’s preference of payments for up to 12 months. Also, the refund procedure is considered only if it is approached within 15 days of the start of the Data Analytics Course.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does the Data Analytics Course provide?
FaqDATA.ans: Regardless of the basic academic certification, Skillslash’s Data Analytics Course provides globally recognized course certification for their learners. Along with this, you will also receive project certification from companies for collaboration with their live projects while doing Data Analytics Course.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the course fees for the Data Analytics Course?
FaqDATA.ans: The course fees of the Data Analytics Course begin at INR 55,000. We also provide scholarship offers in our courses. That is, your aptitude test qualifies you for up to a 10% scholarship in the course fees. A candidate will be qualified for a 10% discount on the course costs if they receive a score on the aptitude test of greater than 65 percent.
